scripts.start: echo 'Starting GestCamp server' && python -m http.server 8080 || npx serve .
scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('public')) fs.mkdirSync('public'); ['index.html', 'styles.css', 'script.js', 'supabase-config.js'].forEach(f => fs.copyFileSync(f, 'public/' + f))"
